sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Post.css'; import { MoreVert, PostAddRounded } from '@material-ui/icons'; import { Users } from '../../dummyData'; const Post = ({post}) => { return (
{Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId)[0]} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
